body_html:
Thanks so much for your reply. In fact my task is to implement the histogram loss mentioned in the paper Stable and Controllable Neural Texture Synthesis and Style Transfer Using Histogram Losses, which involves histogram match technique in the process of computing the loss function. According to the paper we can regard the data flows through the ops that are not differentiable as constants.

While I do not find the op Histogram_fixed_width in 'python/ops/math_grad.py' which mentioned in #897. So I do not konw where I can add the function below.

@ops.RegisterGradient("Histogram_fixed_width")
def _Histogram_fixed_widthGrad(_, grad):
    return [None]
body:
Thanks so much for your reply. In fact my task is to implement the histogram loss mentioned in the paper [Stable and Controllable Neural Texture Synthesis and Style Transfer Using Histogram Losses](https://arxiv.org/abs/1701.08893), which involves histogram match technique in the process of computing the loss function. According to the paper we can regard the data flows through the ops that are not differentiable as constants. 

While I do not find the op Histogram_fixed_width in  'python/ops/math_grad.py' which mentioned in [#897](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/897). So I do not konw where I can  add the function below. 
```
@ops.RegisterGradient("Histogram_fixed_width")
def _Histogram_fixed_widthGrad(_, grad):
    return [None] 
```
